pages.text: The strongest material you could find so far was Netherite. However, repairing [#](bb00bb)Netherite Armor[#]() had the disadvantage that it was more expensive than making the armor itself. In addition, the protection decreased with every scratch. All this is less problematic when the armor simply _cannot_ be damaged.\\_Never wilt, stone blossom._
The Bedrock Helmet comes with **Projectile Protection V**.
The Bedrock Chestplate comes with **Protection V**.
The Bedrock Leggings come with **Blast Protection V**.
The Bedrock Boots come with **Fire Protection V**.
